DOC.brief_title: Correlation Uterine Umbilical Arteries Doppler With Placental Pathology IUGR
DOC.detailed_description: When indicate , conservative management plan IUGR undertaken accord define protocol include antenatal visit , ultrasound surveillance . The frequency fetal surveillance assess visit accord maternal fetal condition . Doppler study perform within last week delivery use 3.5-Mhz transducer , color-flow mapping , 50-Hz high-pass filter ; measurement perform mother semi recumbent position . Color-flow imaging use visualize ascend branch uterine artery . Pulsed Doppler velocimetry perform sample volume 5 mm . A minimum three separate recording take examination . The wave contour uterine artery study presence diastolic notch systolic/end-diastolic ( S/ D ) ratio calculate . Abnormal uterine velocimetry define average ( left right ) S/ D ratio bilateral presence diastolic notching . Umbilical artery waveform measure free-floating loop cord fetal quiescence . The pulsatility index ( PI ) ( maximum velocity - minimum velocity/ mean velocity ) calculate average three measurement use . An abnormal umbilical artery PI define standard deviation mean gestational age base reference standard ( Chitty Altman , 1999 ) . The result Umbilical artery ( UA ) Doppler velocimetry categorize normal ( end-diastolic velocity < 90th percentile reference curve ) , increase ( end-diastolic velocity ≥90th percentile ) , absent , reverse ( Madazil R et al. , 2002 ) Patients admit close surveillance case worsen maternal fetal condition ( e.g . absent reverse UA blood flow , severe preeclampsia ) . Preeclampsia define accord standard criterion ( Arduini D et al , 2002 ) . Tissue sample The general shape placenta assess . The collected placenta weigh trim membrane umbilical cord . Then diameters thickness placenta note . The position insertion umbilical cord fetal surface placenta observe . Transverse cut make maternal surface distance 1-2 cm bread loaf manner examine pale area . All placenta immerse 10 % formalin overnight examine next day . For placenta , block contain cord , membrane full thickness villous tissue prepare . Whole thickness villous tissue block obtain three zone , ) central zone ii ) peripheral zone iii ) intermediate zone first two zone , include area placenta . Placental bed biopsy obtain Caesarean section direct visualization placental site . Biopsies least 1cm take . The specimen fix buffered formalin . The tissue process stained Haematoxlyin Eosin . Microscopic study placenta carry utilizing set standard criterion villous intervillous lesion ( Kotigwar S et al 2011 ) . For study criterion 8 random microscopic field choose 100 villus count field study presence follow criterion : 1 . Syncytial knot > 30 % one field 2 . Fibrinoid necrosis > 5 % one field 3 . Placental infarction > 5 % one field Intervillous space ) Chorangiosis b ) Perivillous fibrinoid deposition > 5 % one field c ) Infarctions ) Presence calcification . e ) Thickened hylinosed blood vessel For statistical purpose change label `` Abnormal placenta '' Immunohistochemistry Expression VEGF CD34 analyze 75 ( 50 placenta IUGR 25 control ) placental villous tissue . Samples ( 1.5 × 1.5 × 1 cm diameter ) take maternal surface placenta ; infarct area exclude study . All tissue fix formalin , embed paraffin , cut 5-μm-thick section , collect slide coat poly-L-lysine . After paraffin remove , section rehydrated . Immunostaining perform streptavidin-biotin-peroxidase method . Endogenous peroxidase activity block use 3 % hydrogen peroxide . Antigen retrieval carry microwave oven 15 minute 10 nM citrate buffer ( pH 6.0 ) VEGF . The section incubate room temperature one hour EP1176Y rabbit polyclonal antibody reactive VEGF ( 1:100 ; Genova , Spain ) , CD34 mouse monoclonal antibody Ventana . USA ) . After wash phosphate-buffered saline Tween-20 , tissue incubate biotin-conjugated secondary antibody biotin-streptavidin complex 30 min room temperature . Reactions visualize 3,3-diaminobenzidine tetrahydrochloride ( DAB ) . Sections counterstained hematoxylin , rinse , mount . Evaluation immunohistochemical stain Evaluation immunohistochemical stain CD34 : Microvessel Density Determination The popular method study angiogenic activity tissue count number microvessels per unit area tissue section , know microvessel density ( MVD ) . ( Hasan J et al , 2002 ) To determine MVD , stain placental vasculature . Tissue section initially screen microscopically low power ( 100× ) identify area high vascularization ( `` hot spot '' ) . Five high-power ( 400× ) field choose randomly , number microvessels high-power field ( 0.09 mm2 ) count sample use ocular grid . MVD sample take mean five value obtain . ( Mustafa G et al , 2012 ) Evaluation immunohistochemical stain VEGF : The intensity localization stain reaction chorionic villous stromal cell , vascular smooth muscle cell , villous vascular endothelial cell , cytotrophoblasts , syncytiotrophoblasts , extravillous trophoblast evaluate . Immunoreactivity antibody score use semi-quantitative scale intensity staining : 0 negative , stain ; 1+ weak positive ; 2+ moderately positive ; 3+ strongly positive . ( Barut F et al , 2010 )
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman gestational age 2834 week fetal growth 5th percentile Pregnancies know vascular maternal disease ( chronic hypertension , autoimmune disease , diabetes ) fetuses structural abnormality twin
